definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Seeing slow dance and hearing fluted or stringed song.
sentences.chinese: 缓歌慢舞凝丝竹，尽日君王看不足。

sentences.english: From various Chinese musical instruments, people can find out the root of ancient Chinese national culture.
sentences.chinese: 从金石丝竹中，可探寻到中国古老民族的文化之根。

sentences.english: Sizhu music is the precious treasure of the music culture of Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 丝竹乐系中华民族音乐文化中之瑰宝。

definition: reed-pipe wind instrument and vertical bamboo flute
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony
to perform music/to play a tune
to play the zither/classical variant of 彈琴|弹琴[tan2 qin2]
pipa, Chinese lute, with 4 strings, a large pear-shaped body and a fretted fingerboard
huqin/family of Chinese two-stringed fiddles, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and bamboo bow with horsehair bowstring
